name: fire-pledge
flavor_text: A column of fire hits the target. When used with its grass equivalent, its power increases and a vast sea of fire appears.
effect_text_extend: Inflicts regular damage.  If a friendly Pokémon used water pledge earlier this turn, moves used by any friendly Pokémon have doubled effect chance for four turns (including this one).
effect_text_simple: With Water Pledge, doubles the effect chance of friendly Pokémon's moves for four turns.
